name: A foul black funeral shroud
data: It increases the users strength poorly.
It increases the users constitution adequately.
It decreases the users wisdom adequately.
It increases the users intelligence colossally.
It decreases the users charisma unbelievably much.
It has almost non-existent armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration impressively.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
It increases the users electric resistance somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers incredibly slowly.
It increases the users magical resistance somewhat.
It increases the users physical resistance somewhat.
It increases the users shadow resistance somewhat.
It decreases the users fire resistance somewhat.
This garment will, if donned by someone of evil alignment, protect the wearer
from the light and may sometimes allow them to escape from the clutches of death.
Three Shards of Gods can be embedded into this dark artifact.
